column5: Thank you, I believe I am fun ;)
Great stuff ;)
Eh, not too bad, considering it can be worse. And you?
Thank you, and no reason to be jealous!
Thank you, please enjoy :)
Thank you, good sir :)
There should be a rent-for-isolation service :D
Haha thank you :)
Did you imagine a salient potato pooping?
It's little potato croquettes I like
Haha it's normal :)
Thank youuuu :)
Thank you, in what sense of "fine" are you asking?
Thank you, dude :)
Two words, amazing compliment :) thank you

I'm saving your post for myself. To remind myself that I am the one who decides what matters and what doesn't. Not letting emotions rule me. Thank you, truly.
And really, congrats!
I do this too. I've thought about it, and I think it helps me feel like I'm winning abandonment. In a way, I leave them hanging, and I have the upper hand.

Yeah, I've been working on myself and taking meds religiously to lessen the pain I feel myself and cause others, but yeah, of course, I don't have it
I feel you
Hey. Happened h to me, but I stayed on it for a while and it leveled out. Just had an overall base level somewhat lifted. Just a personal story, not advice! :)
Yes, yes, yes. Also creating/staying in weird, hurtful, insane situations to keep things interesting.

Hey, I'm so happy for you! Try to write down the for if the situation: what worried you, what you feel, and what made you feel at ease at the time of the date (both inside and outside). At least you'll have something tangible to show your brain next time it's giving you a hard time. 
It's okay to be worried, just don't eat yourself up on the inside with anxiety! All the best to ya.
Oh. Dear. God.
Oh no, that very handsome dude who loves animals is back... Lord have mercy on us
Oh no, cries for help I might have ignored :(
The Irish are unique, and interacting with them is the best thing about living in Ireland. And what you overhear on Luas is the second best.
Ireland is just awesome. There's so many things to love about people, culture, history, arrrgh love you guys
It's my personal atomic bomb

You seem lovely and thoughtful. I know there's more to it, but right now try to remember they there IS loveliness, life in you; there is beauty in lability and fragility. There's something terrifying and so just very human about how humans are horrified to scare each other off, and we, initially, react much, much deeper to that. Try to remind yourself there's also goodness when all your brain is giving you is just constant shit. Fucking chemical reaction bastards.
Give yourself some breathing room. Try to watch your reactions: you know you'll go through a ton of feelings, they will switch. You said she's a lovely girl, so hold your horses and don't sabotage it for her sake: try to behave emotionally eco-friendly.
And good god, have a wonderful time.

Hey, first off, being clean for three years -- huge accomplishment. Second, you're dealing the way you feel you can deal with things at a given time. I think the plan to take it if shit gets unbearable is a security blanket, and fuck when our brains provide us nothing with which we can protect ourselves, I think they're important for us to hold on to. 
It's always good to see a therapist after such events, in my opinion. Keep yourself safe.
Haha, overreaction with so much intention
Fuck my reality

Yeah, for the televised version of my life, duh!

You get it
Abso-fucking-lutely. God, you're so on point.
Good god, I relate so hard. You can't trust your in gut or judgement, you go to anyone else -- they have their own agenda/sense of right and wrong. It can be excruciating.
햊향 햪햟혝혞혣햨햦 햦향 햫햣혬 :)
Thank you!
Thank you, I share cause I care
Glad I serve the community well!
Thank you, happy it feels and looks good!
Come on down if you wish so!
Eight is good ;)
I have to do with an average camera and think of new poses with good angles! So much pressure to perform
Indeed!
Thank you, dear Aussie guy :)
How exquisitely put, thank you!
Oh noooo I don't wanna upset hoomans
Aww, thank you!!
Thank you for both compliments, very thoughtful of you!
Thank you very much, dude!
How come I can't feel him then lol
Thank you, kind sir!

Occasionally: there's less distraction for me to hold on to and I have to spend time with myself now if I haven't planned the distraction matter plan of opting a show on in a group of friends/just chatting with them. 
I feel it's logical when this happens

Hahaha I love it when they push it on you, they get you if they see your trying to get it of the love comment with a joke, distraction or even physically. I'm always like, "bissssh, you don't know a thing"

Congrats, really. Takes a lot to say "no", but it gets easier with practice. 
Really happy for you! Keep on being accountable toward yourself, not anyone else.
Fucking preach, you get it
Why thank you, they were tasty little fuckers! :)

"Understanding Borderline Mothers" and " Mother's who Can't Love" both helped me immensely in this respect. A nurturing female therapist.
Stay strong, lovely.
We'd have an awesome team representing bpd in the Olympics.
What a gem!
Needed this today (after everyday) after a run-in with my psych. Thank you, you lovely human. Much love to you
True dat. Oh true dat.

Yeah, around ten percent attempt too, around four end up taking their lives.
Attempted it last months cause I just didn't want to wake up another day and still have my head on the shoulders and have to deal with five-six daily shit storms to what often feel like zero progress at all.
FUCKING PREACH. sorry, saw the title, it's such a trigger for me, I had to rush to the comment section
We can still have a club
Hahahaha don't worry and will do!
Cause it's not the best idea not to wear pants in the psych ward.
Why would they be ;)
Doesn't matter, got boobies, I guess 游때
Awww thank you, you're all very welcome to do so, I'll good company
Double-blind study, I hope?
HAHAHAHA
You can try :)
Hahaha what's your research topic

I get you 100 percent. Same here. I actually also start having dissociation because of all the goodness. It's too hard for our brains to process that something actually is and makes us feel good, so the brains start working on conspiracy theories.

I don't really have any advice, just wanted you to know you're not alone.
Thank you sir, for both things :)
Hahah glad you like it
Good point, sir!
Thanks, you're giving people freedom of expression
Make me
I'm not half bad at it, I'd love to ;)
Good to know I have a place to stay ;)
Well, do ahead and enlighten us ;)
You are a wise gentleman. You deserve a bit of help ;)
Actually, on a daily basis I hate wearing a bra, so I don't ;)
Your vote is counted ;)

I'll take it for consideration ;)
DUDE your handle is coconut oil, it's the greatest lifehack for dicks! Do you do it yourself?
You're so helpful ;)

I'm going through the same rn and I get you. However, my home country is behind on everything that concerns mental health, so they are saying I'm bipolar after an hourly talk with me not taking any appropriate patient history.
I totally agree with the comment below -- be honest. You can also be honest about why you haven't said anything yet: professionals should understand that someone might be afraid to share these kinds of things, especially because of the stigma attached.
Best of luck to you!
Progress, step away. Shit life, I'm all yours.
Abso-fucking-lutely! Most of the time I think of the mechanisms behind people's comments about themselves, and I analyse the shit out if myself.

Amazing! So well thought-out and easy at the same time. I love the "biologically vulnerable" bit: really makes me think differently about this.
Wanted to tell you your spreadsheet is so good I'll be taking it with me to the psych ward!
Yeah, can confirm: just post suicide attempt after "fixing" my issues myself
Haha you're not dumb, it is and I'm not fucking doing that :D
Maybe I wanna give you ideas! Haha, of course, I'd be very comfortable doing this in a jacket, a skirt and heels
I always thought so too!
Thank you for the tip (pun intended), really, and I'd love to reposition ;)
Thanks. And yeah, usually either naked or in uniform!
Fair enough dude 游때
How inspiring, Malala wouldn't be able to compete!
Why so indirect, are they taking it slow?
